title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1040.12 - Enforcement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1040.12 - Enforcement

State Regulations
(a) Any person
violating any of these rules may receive a summons and/or may be subject to
ejectment from a facility or train. (b) Any police officer is empowered to issue
an appearance ticket and/or order ejectment from a facility or train for
violation of any of these rules. (c) Violation of these rules shall constitute an offense punishable by a fine not
exceeding $50 or imprisonment for not more than 30 days or
both. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1040.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
